textDetails.title: Include the widget
textDetails.p1:
To include the widget, you must copy the text below and paste it on your website.
You can change the elements in bold to personalize your widget.
textDetails.p2: <iframe src="{url}" width="100%" height="440px" frameborder="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>
textDetails.p3: Note: Some publishing tools like Wordpress require the addition of specific plugins to be able to use an iFrame.
